menu.name: Vegetable Samosa
menu.description: Crispy pastry shells filled with spiced mashed potatoes and green peas, served with tangy tamarind chutney.

menu.name: Vegetable Pakora
menu.description: Crisp fritters made from assorted vegetables dipped in spiced gram flour batter and deep-fried to golden perfection.

menu.name: Gobi Pakora
menu.description: Cauliflower florets dipped in a seasoned chickpea flour batter and deep-fried until golden and crispy, delivering a warm, crunchy bite in every piece.

menu.name: Chicken Pakora
menu.description: Crispy chicken strips dipped in chickpea batter and fried with garlic, ginger, and house spices.

menu.name: Vegetable Platter
menu.description: Sampler platter featuring samosa, pakora, aloo tikki, gobi pakora.

menu.name: Non-Vegetable Platter
menu.description: Sampler platter featuring samosa, pakora, aloo tikki, Kashmiri tikka, and chicken pakora.

menu.name: Kashmiri Tikki
menu.description: Chicken thigh marinated in Kashmiri chili, garlic, ginger, and mustard oil, grilled in the tandoor.

menu.name: Chicken 65
menu.description: Chicken bites stir-fried with mustard seeds, curry leaves, garlic, and spicy chili sauce.

menu.name: Indian Tandoori Wings (Smoked)
menu.description: Tandoori-marinated chicken wings char-grilled and tossed in a smoky vindaloo-buffalo glaze.

menu.name: Paneer Chilli
menu.description: Cottage cheese cubes tossed with onions and bell peppers in a bold chili-garlic sauce.

menu.name: Aloo Tikki
menu.description: Pan-fried potato patties spiced with green peas, spinach, roasted chickpea flour, and tangy chaat masala.

menu.name: Samosa Chaat
menu.description: Crushed vegetable samosas, chickpeas, yogurt, tamarind chutney, mint chutney, and spices.

menu.name: Vegetable Chowmein
menu.description: Stir-fried noodles with fresh vegetables, bell peppers, onions, carrots, and scallions in a soy-sesame glaze.

menu.name: Chicken Chowmein
menu.description: Wok-tossed noodles with chicken, cabbage, bell peppers, carrots, onions, and scallions in soy and sesame sauce.

menu.name: Shrimp Chowmein
menu.description: Shrimp stir-fried with noodles, bell peppers, cabbage, onions, and carrots in savory soy-sesame sauce.

menu.name: House Special Chowmein
menu.description: Signature noodles with chicken, shrimp, eggs, mushroom & vegetables, and scallions in a sesame-soy chili sauce.

menu.name: Vegetable Momo (Steamed/Fried)
menu.description: Steamed or fried vegetable momos stuffed with seasoned veggies, cottage cheese, served with tomato-sesame peanut chutney.

menu.name: Chicken Momo (Steamed/Fried)
menu.description: Steamed or fried chicken momos stuffed with minced chicken, vegetables, and spices, served with tomato-sesame peanut chutney.

menu.name: Mulligatawny Soup (Daal Soup)
menu.description: Traditional lentil soup with aromatic spices, vegetables, and herbs.

menu.name: Coconut Tomato Soup
menu.description: Creamy tomato soup with coconut milk and aromatic spices.

menu.name: Chicken Noodles Soup (Indo-Chinese)
menu.description: Hearty chicken noodle soup with vegetables and Indo-Chinese spices.

menu.name: Fresh Veg Salad
menu.description: Fresh mixed vegetables with house dressing and herbs.

menu.name: Fresh Chicken Salad
menu.description: Fresh mixed vegetables with grilled chicken and house dressing.

menu.name: Fresh Shrimp Salad
menu.description: Fresh mixed vegetables with grilled shrimp and house dressing.

menu.name: Fresh Paneer Salad
menu.description: Fresh mixed vegetables with grilled paneer and house dressing.

menu.name: Butter Naan
menu.description: Soft and fluffy Indian flatbread brushed with butter.

menu.name: Garlic Naan
menu.description: Soft naan bread topped with garlic and herbs.

menu.name: Coconut Peshwari Naan
menu.description: Sweet naan stuffed with coconut, nuts, and dried fruits.

menu.name: Sesame Naan
menu.description: Naan bread topped with sesame seeds.

menu.name: Onion Naan
menu.description: Naan bread topped with onions and herbs.

menu.name: Bread Basket
menu.description: Assortment of fresh naan breads.

menu.name: Tandoori Roti
menu.description: Whole wheat flatbread cooked in tandoor.

menu.name: Plain Paratha
menu.description: Layered whole wheat flatbread.

menu.name: Aloo Paratha
menu.description: Stuffed paratha with spiced potato filling.

menu.name: Aloo Naan
menu.description: Naan bread stuffed with spiced potato filling.
